titleStmt.title: A carrier to a king. Or Doctour Carrier (Chaplayne to K. Iames of happy memory) his motiues of renoncing the protestant religio[n] & imbracing the Cath. Roman. Directed to the sayd K. Maiesty.
A treatise written by Mr. doctour Carier, wherein he layeth downe sundry learned and pithy considerations
titleStmt.author: Carier, Benjamin, 1566-1614.
